title: Restaurants on the Edge
overview: Restaurants On The Edge visits eateries in some of the world's most stunning locations. Despite their outstanding views, these restaurants haven't been able to create an experience that lives up to their magnificent surroundings. Follow a team of three experts—a restaurateur, a designer, a chef—as they embark on a journey to not only transform the restaurants, but the owners' outlook as well. Through tapping into the restaurant's surroundings and community, our experts remodel each restaurant in a way that is uplifting, inspirational, and positive.
